mapper.insert: insert into reservationlist values( resvlist_seq.nextval, #{ship_no}, #{resv_no}, #{pob_no}, #{timetable_no}, #{seat_no}, #{resvlist_price}, sysdate, sysdate )
mapper.update: update reservationlist set resvlist_date = to_date(#{resvlist_date}) where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select no from creditcard where card_birth = to_date(#{card_birth})

select r.no resvno, re.resvlist_price, r.*, s.*, t.*, p.*, se.* from reservationlist re, reservationist r, ship s, timetable t, port p, seatinfo se where re.resv_no = r.no and re.ship_no = s.no and re.seat_no = se.no and re.timetable_no = t.no and (t.port_no1 = p.no or t.port_no2 = p.no) and re.resv_no = #{resv_no}
select p.* from reservationlist re, persononboard p where re.pob_no = p.no and p.resv_no = #{resv_no}
select p.no from reservationist r, persononboard p where r.no = p.resv_no and p.resv_no = #{resv_no}

select re.no, pe.no pobno, re.resv_no, pe.pob_name, to_char(t.timetable_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') timetable_date, (select p.port_name from timetable t, reservationist r, port p where t.no = r.timetable_no and p.no = t.port_no1 and r.no = #{resv_no}) pname1, (select p.port_name from timetable t, reservationist r, port p where t.no = r.timetable_no and p.no = t.port_no2 and r.no = #{resv_no}) pname2, s.ship_name, se.seat_grade, re.resvlist_price from persononboard pe, timetable t, port p, ship s, seatinfo se, reservationlist re where re.resv_no = #{resv_no} and (t.port_no1 = p.no or t.port_no2 = p.no) and s.no = re.ship_no and re.seat_no = se.no and re.timetable_no = t.no and re.pob_no = pe.no group by re.no, pe.no, re.resv_no, pe.pob_name, to_char(t.timetable_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), s.ship_name, se.seat_grade, re.resvlist_price order by re.no

select re.no, pe.no pobno, re.resv_no, pe.pob_name, to_char(t.timetable_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') timetable_date, (select p.port_name from timetable t, reservationist r, port p where t.no = r.timetable_no and p.no = t.port_no1 and r.no = #{resv_no}) pname1, (select p.port_name from timetable t, reservationist r, port p where t.no = r.timetable_no and p.no = t.port_no2 and r.no = #{resv_no}) pname2, s.ship_name, se.seat_grade, re.resvlist_price from persononboard pe, timetable t, port p, ship s, seatinfo se, reservationlist re, reservationist r where (t.port_no1 = p.no or t.port_no2 = p.no) and r.no = re.resv_no and r.resv_name = #{resv_name} and r.resv_tel = #{resv_tel} and r.resv_birth = to_date(#{resv_birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and s.no = re.ship_no and re.seat_no = se.no and re.timetable_no = t.no and re.pob_no = pe.no group by re.no, pe.no, re.resv_no, pe.pob_name, to_char(t.timetable_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), s.ship_name, se.seat_grade, re.resvlist_price order by re.no

select re.no, pe.no pobno, re.resv_no, pe.pob_name, to_char(t.timetable_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') timetable_date, (select p.port_name from timetable t, persononboard pe, reservationist r, port p where pe.resv_no = r.no and t.no = r.timetable_no and p.no = t.port_no1 and pe.no = #{pob_no}) pname1, (select p.port_name from timetable t, persononboard pe, reservationist r, port p where pe.resv_no = r.no and t.no = r.timetable_no and p.no = t.port_no2 and pe.no = #{pob_no}) pname2, s.ship_name, se.seat_grade, re.resvlist_price from persononboard pe, timetable t, port p, ship s, seatinfo se, reservationlist re where (t.port_no1 = p.no or t.port_no2 = p.no) and s.no = re.ship_no and re.seat_no = se.no and re.timetable_no = t.no and re.pob_no = pe.no and pe.pob_name = #{pob_name} and pe.pob_birth = to_date(#{pob_birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and pe.pob_tel = #{pob_tel} group by re.no, pe.no, re.resv_no, pe.pob_name, to_char(t.timetable_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), s.ship_name, se.seat_grade, re.resvlist_price order by re.no

select re.no, pe.no pobno, re.resv_no, pe.pob_name, to_char(t.timetable_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') timetable_date, (select p.port_name from timetable t, reservationist r, creditcard c, port p where c.resv_no = r.no and t.no = r.timetable_no and p.no = t.port_no1 and c.resv_no = #{resv_no}) pname1, (select p.port_name from timetable t, reservationist r, creditcard c, port p where c.resv_no = r.no and t.no = r.timetable_no and p.no = t.port_no2 and c.resv_no = #{resv_no}) pname2, s.ship_name, se.seat_grade, re.resvlist_price from creditcard c, persononboard pe, timetable t, port p, ship s, seatinfo se, reservationlist re where (t.port_no1 = p.no or t.port_no2 = p.no) and s.no = re.ship_no and re.seat_no = se.no and re.timetable_no = t.no and re.pob_no = pe.no and re.resv_no = #{resv_no} and c.card_num1 = #{card_num1} and c.card_num2 = #{card_num2} and c.card_num3 = #{card_num3} and c.card_num4 = #{card_num4} group by re.no, pe.no, re.resv_no, pe.pob_name, to_char(t.timetable_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), s.ship_name, se.seat_grade, re.resvlist_price order by re.no
select r.no from reservationist r, persononboard p where p.resv_no = r.no and r.resv_name = #{resv_name} and r.resv_tel = #{resv_tel} and r.resv_birth = to_date(#{resv_birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select no from persononboard where pob_name = #{pob_name} and pob_tel = #{pob_tel} and pob_birth = to_date(#{pob_birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select r.no from creditcard c, reservationist r where r.no = c.resv_no and card_num1 = #{card_num1} and card_num2 = #{card_num2} and card_num3 = #{card_num3} and card_num4 = #{card_num4}
select s.sale_kind from ticketsale s, persononboard p where s.no = p.sale_no and p.no = #{no}
select p.no from persononboard p, reservationist r where r.no = p.resv_no and p.resv_no = #{resv_no}
select r.resv_name, c.* from reservationist r, creditcard c where r.no = c.resv_no and r.no = #{no}
